official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to develop and install a flood warning system for the Santa Clara River, Ventura and Los Angeles Counties, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to develop and install a flood warning system for the Santa Clara River and its tributaries, Ventura and Los Angeles Counties, California. Requires such system to provide for base stations in both Ventura and Santa Paula, California. Specifies that non-Federal interests must agree to operate and maintain such system and to develop, maintain, and implement such emergency preparedness plans for flooding along the Santa Clara River as are satisfactory to the Secretary.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to develop and install a flood warning system for the Santa Clara River, Ventura and Los Angeles Counties, California.
